words.def: a solid piece of something (usually having flat rectangular sides)
a very strong lager traditionally brewed in the fall and aged through the winter for consumption in the spring
a fastener fitted to a door or drawer to keep it firmly closed
a group of countries in special alliance
An African antelope closely related to the lechwe and the waterbuck, Kobus kob.
nut of any of several trees of the genus Corylus
an easy return of a tennis ball in a high arc
